alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:05AM CDT until April 01 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Limestone County in north central Alabama... Northeastern Lauderdale County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 204 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lexington, or 14 miles northeast of Florence, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lexington, Elkmont, Anderson, Lester, Good Springs, Cartwright, Kingtown, Whitehead, Cairo and Mt Rozell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
